contentrichtext.text: {{Coord|59|57|N|30|19|E|type:adm1st_source:itwiki|display=title}} {{Infobox settlement |name=Northwestern Federal District |native_name=Северо-Западный федеральный округ |native_name_lang=ru |settlement_type=[[Federal Districts of Russia|Federal District]] of [[Russia]] |image_map =Northwestern in Russia.svg |map_caption =Location of the Northwestern Federal District |subdivision_type =Country |subdivision_name ={{RUS}} |established_title =Established |established_date =May 18, 2000 |seat_type =administrative center |seat =[[Saint Petersburg|St. Petersburg]] |leader_title =Presidential Envoy |leader_name =[[Vladimir Bulavin]] |unit_pref =Metric<!-- or US or UK --> |area_total_km2 =1677900 |area_rank =4th |population_total =13616057 |total_type =Total |population_as_of =2010 |population_rank =5th |population_density_km2 =auto |population_urban = |population_rural = |blank_name_sec1 =Federal subjects |blank_info_sec1 =11 contained |blank1_name_sec1 =Economic regions |blank1_info_sec1 =3 contained |website ={{URL|http://www.szfo.ru/}} |footnotes = }} '''Northwestern Federal District''' ({{lang-ru|Се́веро-За́падный федера́льный о́круг}}, ''Severo-Zapadny federalny okrug'') is one of the [[federal districts of Russia|eight federal districts]] of [[Russia]]. It consists of the northern part of [[European Russia]]. Its population was 13,616,057 (83.5% urban) according to the [[Russian Census (2010)|2010 Census]],<ref name="2010Census">{{ru-pop-ref|2010Census}}</ref> living on an area of {{convert|1677900|km2|sp=us}}. The current Envoy to the Northwestern Federal District is Vladimir Bulavin. ==Demographics== ===Federal subjects=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! colspan="4" | [[File:Northwestern Federal District (numbered).svg|400px|Northwestern Federal District]] |- ! # ! Flag ! Federal subject ! Capital/Administrative center |- ! 1 | [[File:Flag of Arkhangelsk Oblast.png|50px|border]] | [[Arkhangelsk Oblast]] | [[Arkhangelsk]] |- ! 2 | [[File:Flag of Vologda Oblast.png|50px|border]] | [[Vologda Oblast]] | [[Vologda]] |- ! 3 | [[File:Flag of Kaliningrad Oblast.svg|50px|border]] | [[Kaliningrad Oblast]] | [[Kaliningrad]] |- ! 4 | [[File:Flag of Karelia.svg|50px|border]] | [[Republic of Karelia]] | [[Petrozavodsk]] |- ! 5 | [[File:Flag of Komi.svg|50px|border]] | [[Komi Republic]] | [[Syktyvkar]] |- ! 6 | [[File:Flag of Leningrad Oblast.svg|50px|border]] | [[Leningrad Oblast]] | ''none'' |- ! 7 | [[File:Flag of Murmansk Oblast.svg|50px|border]] | [[Murmansk Oblast]] | [[Murmansk]] |- ! 8 | [[File:Flag of Nenets Autonomous District.svg|50px|border]] | [[Nenets Autonomous Okrug]] | [[Naryan-Mar]] |- ! 9 | [[File:Flag of Novgorod oblast.png|50px|border]] | [[Novgorod Oblast]] | [[Veliky Novgorod]] |- ! 10 | | [[Pskov Oblast]] | [[Pskov]] |- ! 11 | [[File:Flag of Saint Petersburg Russia.svg|50px|border]] | colspan="2" | '''[[Saint Petersburg]]''' |} ==Presidential plenipotentiary envoys== #[[Viktor Cherkesov]] (May 18, 2000 – March 11, 2003) #[[Valentina Matviyenko]] (March 11, 2003 – October 15, 2003) #[[Ilya Klebanov]] (November 1, 2003 – Present) ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *{{Ru icon}} [http://www.szfo.ru/ Plenipotentiary of the President of the Russian Federation in the Northwestern Federal District] {{Subdivisions of Russia}} {{Use mdy dates|date=July 2012}} [[Category:Northwestern Federal District| ]] [[Category:States and territories established in 2000]]
